Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Relation/invert

Synopsis Invert the tuples in a relation.
Function rel[&T1, &T0] invert (rel[&T0, &T1] R)
Examples 
rascal>import Relation;
ok
rascal>invert({<1,10>, <2,20>});
rel[int, int]: {
  <20,2>,
  <10,1>
}
